name: ImproveIT Solutions

description:
ImproveIT Solutions creates fantastic web, mobile and SaaS solutions for hi-tech customers from Israel, Europe, and the USA. We also provide talented dedicated teams of engineers, who work directly for product companies from around the globe.
 
Our founders have more than 10 years of combined experience in software development and outsourcing/outstaffing industry. After working in different companies and with different clients - from startups to Silicon valley corporations, they decided to set up their own business based on all gained expertise, established processes and conclusions drawn from previous errors.
Our engagement models:
- time and material projects
- a fully functional dedicated team 
- dedicated developers for short-term full-time or part-time engagement
Our technologies: Javascript, React, Angular, Vue.js, Node.js, .Net/C#, Java, PHP, iOS, Android, React Native
